text: [Music]
the flying bicycle once upon a time
there lived a poor boy named Allen in a
small village
his father would sell grass to make a
living to feed the family and send Allen
to school Allen had to walk a mile every
day to get to school all his other
classmates had their bicycles and they
made fun of poor AB hey Allen don't your
feet hurt walking so much we was calling
mr. to feet no bike Allen was really
upset about being made fun of like this
so he went to his parents and demanded
all my friends write to school on their
bikes I too on my own bicycle palan we
don't have money for a bicycle son just
wait a few months please I'm sorry for
being so demanding father I don't want a
bicycle I'm happy to go to school
walking that night as Allen was asleep
his parents made a decision Allen is one
of the few boys in the village who do
not have a bicycle poor child how he is
getting bullied
and see how sensitive our son is when I
told him we couldn't afford one he
agreed to continue walking to school at
once I must get him a bicycle somehow
just take this and sell it Maria
of what use is a necklace a bicycle will
be a lot more useful for Alan and for
you so Alan's father sold the necklace
and bought Alan an old bicycle Alan was
overjoyed now he would ride to school
every day one day as he was returning
the chain of the old bicycle broke Alan
got off and was trying to fix it when he
suddenly heard a sound coming from the
lake nearby Alan saw that someone was
drowning in the lake he ran towards the
lake and jumped into the water to say
thank you so much boy
you saved my life I only did what anyone
would naturally do you don't have to
thank me
is there anything I can do for you
please let me help right now my bike is
broken Oh would you like a brand new
bike that flies I can make your bike fly
I can make your fly bike the wizard
tapped on the bike and suddenly it
sprouted wings and changed into a brand
new flashy one the wizard warned Alan as
long as you remain as good and helpful
as you are the bike will remain like
this but if you become selfish the wings
will disappear and your bicycle will
change to the old one again Alan happily
took the bike home and told his parents
everything now while all the other
children would ride on the road
Alan would fly to school every day look
air goes out
I wish I had a flying bike now lucky
Ellen is wherever Alan went people would
look at him in awe and admiration soon
Alan began to feel very special and
became rude and arrogant just because he
had a flying bike father you have no
school today so I am taking the bike to
the field to cut some grass no father
don't take my beautiful bicycle to the
muddy dirty field see you Alan this is
my bicycle alright the wizard gave it to
me and I will not allow anyone else to
use it hey Ben what's the matter don't
you have a bicycle see I have a flying
one a wizard was so impressed by me that
he gave this to me as a thank-you gift
as soon as Alan said these mean words
the bicycle lost its wings became old
again and fell to the ground all the
other children started laughing at him
then came to him and helped him up
are you alright the wizard had said
[Music]
Allen had now realized that he had
become mean and rude and selfish that is
why his bike had become old again he
deserved this he went home repaired the
bike and told his father Allen I'm so
sorry father I was so rude to you you
were the one who brought me the bicycle
and I stopped you from using it how
could I do that now I have prepared it
you take it every day to the fields and
I shall walk to school I will never
complain again I promise so from that
day Allen began walking to school again
he and Ben became good friends then one
day after many months Allen found
another bicycle the same as the wizard
had given him at his door Allen let his
dad ride it and himself started going to
school on the old one but this time he
would take Ben along with him everyday
we have no right to be rude just because
the things we have might be better than
those of others we must ever be thankful
and respectful to everyone
[Music]
